scripts.generate-posts: cd generated && lodash-template-cli ../templates/post.html posts/*.json ../public && cd .. && renamer --find .json --replace .html 'public/posts/*'
scripts.generate-post-sections: cd generated && lodash-template-cli ../templates/post-section.html posts/*.json ../generated/sections && cd .. && renamer --find .json --replace .html 'generated/sections/posts/*'
scripts.generate-index: shx cat generated/sections/posts/* > generated/sections/concatenated.html && node -e "console.log(JSON.stringify({html: require('fs').readFileSync('generated/sections/concatenated.html').toString()}))" | lodash-template-cli templates/index.html > public/index.html
scripts.generate: npm run-script clean && node generate.js && npm run-script generate-posts && npm run-script generate-post-sections && npm run-script generate-index && js-beautify --html -E none -I -r public/index.html public/posts/*.html
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf generated && shx rm -rf public/posts && shx rm -f public/index.html
